name: Baddie Heaven
description:
All baddies go to Heaven  

It's Marty Pants Games Presents: Baddie Heaven

Baddie Heaven is a fun flying survival game made with love and a bop . 

 

Game Controls: Tap That

At work/ on browser? Tap left mouse button to stay fly.

Android or IOS. Tap The Screen.

Soundtrack by Wyndolyn. https://www.beatstars.com/woodlyn

Next Release will feature:

  •   New Skins  
  •  Leaderboards
  •  Levels
